title: 12/15/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 12/15/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Dan talks about Steph Curry passing Ray Allen for 3-pointers in the NBA. Dan says Curry's success at the 3-point shot has not been good for those who will follow him in years to come.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
